directions: Heat a skillet over high heat. Drizzle olive oil into the skillet. Add half the kale to the skillet; saute until mostly wilted, about 2 minutes. Add remaining kale to the skillet; saute until wilted, about 2 minutes. Stir in orange zest and juice. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Delicious Homemade Orange Zest Kale
